SEARCH
Package edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.router

Class Node

java.lang.Object
edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.router.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Node>
public class Node extends Object implements Comparable<Node>
This class represents the basic routing element, a node or wire. A node is described as a wire with a particular name in a particular tile. When routing, it keeps track of the source node by setting the parent variable.
Author:
Chris Lavin

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    cost
    This is the routing cost of using this node in the current route
    protected int
    history
    This is the combined cost of a node when it is used, and used multiple times
    protected boolean
    isPIP
    Determines if this node connected to the node after it creates a PIP
    protected int
    level
    This is the number of hops from the original source of the route this node is
    protected Node
    parent
    This is the pointer to a parent node in the route it is a part of
    protected Tile
    tile
    This is the tile where the node/wire resides
    protected int
    wire
    This is the enumerated int that represents the name of the wire specified
    protected WireConnection[]
    wires
    Keeps track of the wires that this node connects to

  • Constructor Details

    • Node

      public Node()
      Empty constructor, sets tile and wires to null. Sets wire and cost to -1. level and history are set to 0 and isPIP is set to false.

    • Node

      public Node(Tile tile, int wire)
      A quick population constructor, parent is set to null, and the level is 0.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile of the new node.
      wire - The wire of the new node.

    • Node

      public Node(Tile tile, int wire, Node parent, int level)
      A quick population constructor.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile of the new node.
      wire - The wire of the new node.
      parent - The parent of the new node, or null if none.
      level - The number of nodes between this node and the source node.

    • Node

      public Node(Tile tile, int wire, Node parent, int level, boolean isPIP)
      A quick population constructor.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile of the new node.
      wire - The wire of the new node.
      parent - The parent of the new node, or null if none.
      level - The number of nodes between this node and the source node.
      isPIP - A flag indicating that this node and its parent form a PIP.
